issueDescription: Screen not responding to touch in upper right corner. Customer reports issue started 3 days after purchase.
supplierResponse: Defect confirmed. Replacement unit authorized under warranty terms.
resolutionNotes: Replacement device shipped to customer. Original unit returned to supplier for inspection.

issueDescription: Battery draining rapidly, device gets hot during normal use. Issue appeared after software update.
Camera lens cracked internally without external damage. Manufacturing defect suspected.
Charging port loose, cable disconnects frequently. Customer reports gentle use only.
supplierResponse: Physical damage detected during inspection. Not covered under warranty terms.
resolutionNotes: Customer notified of rejection. Offered paid repair option at discounted rate.

issueDescription: Device fails to power on after latest update. Multiple restart attempts unsuccessful.
supplierResponse: Software corruption confirmed. Reflashing authorized under warranty.
resolutionNotes: Device reflashed successfully at our facility. Customer notified and device returned. Issue resolved.
